name: karrat-voting
author: your-github-handle
description: Snapshot strategy using getVotes to determine correct voting power for KARRAT token, supporting delegated and self-held votes.
about: Counts on-chain delegated votes and self balances accurately by using ERC20Votes' getVotes.
examples: Example: User holds 10,000 KARRAT with no delegation → getVotes = 10,000.
Example: User delegates their 10,000 KARRAT to another wallet → getVotes = 0, delegate's getVotes increases.
